experience: You and Azim both know Luca Amoroso

Advances in high-throughput assays resulted in abundant genomics, epi-geneomics, transcriptomics, proteomics and metabolomics data that have the potential to reveal critical drivers of human diseases. Despite this progress, integrating multi-omics data across multiple patients remains as major challenge because samples from same disease can be very heterogeneous. During my stay at MIT, I'm working on new network optimization algorithm that integrates different "comics"  data and can extracts deregulated pathways in individual patients and highlights new targets for therapeutic developments.

In  broad sense, I'm data scientist and I would like to extend and apply current machine learning algorithms to any kind of real world problems.Currently as PhD student,  I'm interested in building integrative models by integrating different high-throughput assays that can further  our understanding from complex biological systems. More precisely  interested in applying and extending current machine learning algorithms to build models which allow us to understand RNA interaction networks in cancer.One of my other main interest is to develop efficient machine learning software's to mine big data in order to get novel biological insights to a any given question.
Researh Scholar at Recombinant Product and Drug Informatics Groups

summary: In  broad sense, I'm data scientist  and I'm interested in analyzing any complex data set to make actionable data driven decision. More specifically, I'm interested to mine and analyze big data and develop efficient tools and algorithms for mining such data sets.My interests vary from modeling real world problems as convex optimization problem and solving it with state of art methods to writing new software solutions for them. I have solid background in machine learning and optimization by training.  Currently I'm following convex optimization and Deep learning field and their applications. I'm comfortable working  with R, Matlab, Python, Spark and C++. Learning new programming language is fun for me .
